title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197Removing a working set immediately makes changes
OB: When creating a working set with one project and selecting it, the package view is filtered. However, immediately removing the working set causes changes to occur.
EB: The package view should remain filtered when removing a working set immediately.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it.
2. Observe that the package view is filtered.
3. Open the working set dialog again.
4. Create a second working set.
5. Delete the first working set.
